summary: PHP SDK client calls can hang indefinitely when the Temporal server is unreachable. The request is to add a `withTimeout()` method to the Workflow Client class to allow developers to set custom gRPC timeouts for client operations.
userImpact: Applications can hang indefinitely when unable to reach the Temporal server, preventing proper error handling and recovery.
rootCause: PHP gRPC client calls lack configurable timeout mechanisms, causing indefinite blocking on unreachable servers.
proposedFix: Add `withTimeout(int $timeout)` method to Workflow Client class to allow setting custom timeouts for client calls.
keyQuote: Currently, if the Temporal server is not reachable, the PHP client will hang forever.
